channel.title: OMG, I still can't get on anyones server please read post before u use this poll
channel.description:
i still can't get on anyones server (or mine (127.0.0.1)), omg! :( :mad: :( :mad:
it says either 'error connecting to server...' OR 'unexpected error...please try another world...'
please help
also, when i log onto the default one (127.0.0.1) it loggs me out again... :( :mad: :( :mad:

item.title: OMG, I still can't get on anyones server please read post before u use this poll
item.dc:creator: @josh11811 josh11811
item.description:
@josh11811 wrote:

Toastface5 i had the same problem and I FIXED IT! Open up an internet page then: click tools, internet options then click security at the top then click custom level, then scroll down to JAVA VM then set it to high safety instead of blocked.

Hope I Helped.

Read full topic

item.title: OMG, I still can't get on anyones server please read post before u use this poll
item.dc:creator: @toastface5 toastface5
item.description:
@toastface5 wrote:

ok, #1, death wish, sorry i couldn’t get onto your server.
#2, the SORROW, thanks, ill try it, ill pm you if i need more help. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 02:28:18 PM[/size][hr]dang, i finally got onto someones server, and my pc lagged really badly :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.source: OMG, I still can't get on anyones server please read post before u use this poll

item.title: OMG, I still can't get on anyones server please read post before u use this poll
item.dc:creator: @the_S0RR0W the S0RR0W
item.description:
@the_S0RR0W wrote:

Ok here is the low down on how to get a high success at logging in,

  1. when looking on the forums for a server #1check that the poster is online becuase if not the server is probably not online. #2 check that you have the right port. default is 43594. #4 check that the IP adress is right.

  2. Try restarting your moparscape client then press start server and go to the login section and evter the ip you want.

They are the top reasons for not being able to login on a server.

If you have any more trouble, pm me and ill help you out.

Read full topic
